title: Incorrect number of missed call notifications
content:
Whenever I miss "1" actual call, my notification tells me I actually missed 5 calls, one time last week it said I had 20 missed calls, but when I checked the actual call logs I only found 1 recent missed call. It seems that the process of "clearing" missed calls isnt working as it should and therefore they are continuing to add up. I went back a couple of months to see if anything wasn't "cleared" or "pressed on" but didnt see anything highlighted. 

I have a pixel 3a XL with os version 10

Can anyone help?

Thank you!
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
